All,

Has anyone had trouble getting ChemEquil to behave?  I am running a
simple equilibrium problem with Ideal gases (and GRI3.0).  I want to
compute equilibrium solutions for a range of stoichiometries and
various enthalpies.

At adiabatic enthalpies, things work fine.  However, as I decrease the
enthalpy further from the adiabatic value, ChemEquil hangs in
ChemEquil::setInitialMoles inside the call to simplx_.  It gets stuck
in an infinite loop (the L20-L30 loop).

Any thoughts?

James
